lines.text: Why does everyone keep punching me in the face?
We did a good job. Now we're out of business. Nobody wants what we make any more.

[crying]
How do I look?
Charlotte, I have to be honest with you honey. You look like you just stepped out of a plane crash.
I have never been so humiliated in my life. I swear to God. If I ever get my hands on him, I'll kill him. I mean it. If I'd have been holding a gun, I'd have shot him.
You must really love him. I mean, if you want to kill him and all. Is that my coleslaw?
Charlotte, there's just one thing in the whole world that's stronger than a woman's love. It's a man's pride. Those are your onion rings. You gotta kick him in the pride.
Where's that?
There's someone that's following me around.
Who?
I don't know. I don't know. I'm not sure he's even really there.
Oh, don't be silly. You're fine. You're just fine.
I don't want to do this.
You don't?
No, I don't.
You want to live after all.
Yes.
Then live.
Live?
Quit walkin' around like you were dead.
[last lines]
Mrs. Wrangway! I swimming!
Bravo!
